name: multi-downloader-nx
description: Downloader for Crunchyroll, Hidive, AnimeOnegai, and AnimationDigitalNetwork with CLI and GUI
author: AnimeDL <AnimeDL@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.start: bun run prestart && cd lib && bun gui.js
scripts.build-windows-cli: bun run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build windows-x64
scripts.build-linux-cli: bun run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build linuxstatic-x64
scripts.build-arm-cli: bun run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build linux-arm64
scripts.build-macos-cli: bun run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build macos-x64
scripts.build-alpine-cli: bun run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build alpine-x64
scripts.build-android-cli: bun run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build linuxstatic-armv7
scripts.build-windows-gui: bun run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build windows-x64 true
scripts.build-linux-gui: bun run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build linuxstatic-x64 true
scripts.build-arm-gui: bun run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build linux-arm64 true
scripts.build-macos-gui: bun run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build macos-x64 true
scripts.build-alpine-gui: bun run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build alpine-x64 true
scripts.build-android-gui: bun run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build linuxstatic-armv7 true
scripts.test: bun run pretest && cd lib && bun modules/build windows-x64 && bun modules/build linuxstatic-x64 && bun modules/build macos-x64
